package.description: This package contains modified files from the Meka Robotics' meka_description package for simulating the Meka M1 mobile manipulator using gazebo, adapted to more accurately reflect the Meka M1 robots being used at the Georgia Institute of Technology.
package.author: Phillip Grice and Daehyung Park, Healthcare Robotics Lab, Georgia Institute of Technology. Advisor: Charles Kemp.
